description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooker Pumpkin Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow Cooker Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook leek and onion, stirring, for 4 minutes or until softened. Add rosemary and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Place leek mixture in the bowl of a 5.5L slow cooker. Add pumpkin, pour over stock, cover with lid and cook on low for 6 hours.

Turn off slow cooker. Using a stick blender, blend mixture, until smooth. Stir in 1/3 cup cream and season. Ladle soup into bowls, drizzle over remaining cream over soup, scatter over chives and serve with bread.
